Name: jainms
Title: OK
Review: one of the site seeing place in Hyderabad & can visit once, Maintenance is not great. Located near to Golconda fort.

Name: Trending T
Title: Best thing to experience
Review: This one has got good experience to have and good sight seeing place to be with and to go with friends and to enjoy

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: excellent for photos
Review: This place  has lot of birds and in fact has migratory birds as well.Good to visit in the morning and evening and amazing for taking photographs

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Best timepasser
Review: This place will give you good timepass and will let you enjoy as suchn  and will make your mind pleasant and healthy'

Name: Ankur_the_explorer
Title: Clean and peaceful lake
Review: We went to this lake in the evening. There is ample car parking. Car parking is 20 Rs. After parking you can see a park. On paying Rs 10 per person you can enter the park. Nice for strolling around. You have some slides and see-saw for kids to play. Lot of people were picnicking here. You can also get view of the lake. Outside the park there is a small canteen. From there you can walk on the bridge and admire the lake. However you cannot go to the lake as it is fenced. Near canteen there are few stairs which take you to a sort of view point from where you can get clear view of the lake.

Name: TravelingGypsy0508
Title: A Peaceful Spot!
Review: It is an ideal place to be in around early mornings or late evening. Good place to click pictures. Area around it is not so clean but it does get green and beautiful during monsoons.

Name: deepa v
Title: Lake
Review: It's a nice place to visit early mornings or can plan a day visit.kids can enjoy .there is greenery around.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Decent lake
Review: It is one of the decent lakes in the city of Hyderabad.Please do visit this place, only in rainy season.

Name: Usha65
Title: Nice picnic spot
Review: It is a paradise for picnic lovers. It is mainly a huge lake that serves as drinking water source for the city of Hyderabad. But worth visiting.

Name: Daniel T
Title: For the price, its a perfect option for day-out
Review: Its a public place, so effectively you have a lot of space to walk round. Entry into the near-by park is nominal, this makes it a nice option for a day-out with family.Be careful when you walk over the bridge & go closer to the water from the park.Ample space for vehicle parking.

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: Great bird watching
Review: Gandipet Lake at Hyderabad is a great place to see some good variety of bird.do visit early in the morning

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Another hang out place to be around
Review: From Mehdipatnam one can take Bus Route no 120. Near by place is CBIT engineering college. Good place to be around especially with friends. Best time to be around is around Evening. Be careful a bit as the place is not safe for girls after evening 5 PM.

Name: sandeep g
Title: lake
Review: you can't see very  natural beauty here , dont expect more about place it is just a lake .. dont expect more

Name: gani1997
Title: Lake in hyderabad
Review: Not that much famous place to see but its good to stay near water in hot summer season except this everything else is normal.

Name: Uma
Title: Volunteer
Review: Visited couple of times... Usually early hours in the morning and evenings are good  timing to visit......Fitness freaks who are into cycling and running visit this lake frequently.... A place u can sit, relax and stretch :)

Name: Abdur RAHMAN S
Title: Good place to spend time and relax
Review: Went there many times with friends early mornings on weekends. This time it was wit family. The water is abundant here and the rocks below the bridge make the scene more beautiful.We have a park beside this where the kids and family played, ate and enjoyed. At the other end of the bund, we can get down on the opposite side than the water. Its much greenery there with really small pond of clean water. But dont know if its allowed to get down there. If you are wit friends, nice place to hang over with them and also to explore around:) Just dont get near the water :)

Name: AfrozPasha
Title: Nice place to spend half a day
Review: It's big Lake with a dam. It has got park for kids to play. In the evening you feel the breeze. You will have Metro buses that starts from Mehdipatnam.

Name: Gowthamcivilion
Title: For a Beautiful lake view
Review: This is 20km away from hyderabad. you can walk in the bund road till 6pm in the evening. Parking facility is available.

Name: Vankam S
Title: Most hartful lake of hyd
Review: This lake is water is very useful for hyderabad people. So everybody   like and enjoy here seenary.And this is picnicspot for all families

Name: jaggu536
Title: place for youngsters
Review: you can find good time with friends. you can chillout here. rides are gone through this way. it is the one of the attractions in hyderabad
